name: Coupang, Inc.
summary: Coupang, Inc. is an e-commerce company that operates one of the largest online marketplaces in South Korea. The company offers a wide range of products, including groceries, electronics, apparel, and home goods, through its e-commerce platforms. Coupang is known for its rapid delivery services, often referred to as its "Rocket Delivery" service, which aims to deliver orders within 24 hours.
